Uses of Interface
org.opengis.referencing.datum.Datum

Packages that use Datum
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.referencing.crs
Coordinate Reference System (CRS) definitions as coordinate systems related to the earth through datum.
org.apache.sis.referencing.datum
Relationship of a CoordinateSystem (an abstract mathematical entity) to the earth or other system.
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory
Creates Coordinate Reference System (CRS) objects from given properties or authority codes.
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
Factories for geodetic objects defined in a SQL database, typically the EPSG dataset.
org.opengis.referencing.crs
Coordinate reference systems (coordinate systems with a datum).
org.opengis.referencing.datum
Geodetic datum (the relationship of a coordinate system to the earth).

    Class
    Description

    Defines the location and orientation of an ellipsoid that approximates the shape of the earth.

  • Uses of Datum in org.opengis.referencing.datum

    Subinterfaces of Datum in org.opengis.referencing.datum
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    EngineeringDatum
    Defines the origin of an engineering coordinate reference system.
    interface 
    GeodeticDatum
    Defines the location and precise orientation in 3-dimensional space of a defined ellipsoid (or sphere) that approximates the shape of the earth.
    interface 
    ImageDatum
    Defines the origin of an image coordinate reference system.
    interface 
    TemporalDatum
    A temporal datum defines the origin of a temporal coordinate reference system.
    interface 
    VerticalDatum
    A textual description and/or a set of parameters identifying a particular reference level surface used as a zero-height surface.
